dict.acceptation: “concern”的现在分词；涉及；关心；顾虑，忧虑；

sent.orig: Counsel is of two sorts: the one concerning manners, the other concerning business.
sent.trans: 诤言共有两种：一是关于行为的，一是关于事业的。

sent.orig: It becomes an important tendency in contemporary cognition development research from concerning domain-generality to concerning domain-specificity.
sent.trans: 从关注领域一般性到关注领域特殊性，是当代认知发展研究的一个重要发展方向。

sent.orig: The high priest then questioned Jesus concerning His disciples and concerning His teaching.
sent.trans: 大祭司就盘问耶稣关于祂门徒和祂教训的事。

sent.orig: Different grinding strategies concerning different program feature are discussed. Code grinding method concerning discussed separately.
sent.trans: 根据程序不同特征，分别给出了针对过程、针对非结构化控制流、针对组合数据类型以及针对并发程序的不同研磨办法。

sent.orig: Taxpayer: What about the arguments concerning the tax payments?
sent.trans: 纳税人：那对纳税争议是怎么规定的？
